snippet: The workers from the Transcaribe Trading Company used 30 trucks to surround the offices of La Prensa, which has published investigative articles about the company.
lead_paragraph: The workers from the Transcaribe Trading Company used 30 trucks to surround the offices of La Prensa, which has published investigative articles about the company.

headline.seo: Panama: President Ends Blockade at La Prensa
headline.main: Panama: President Ends Blockade at Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Panama: President Ends Blockade at Newspaper
